name: Westbrook International
description:
Westbrook have been selected as one of just six salesforce.com Platinum Cloud Alliance Partners in the UK. 100% of our projects are Salesforce focused and we provide innovative professional services for businesses of all sizes across all sectors to optimise the power of Cloud Computing. To fuel our continuing growth, we are actively seeking highly-motivated graduates and experienced professionals to join our team.
If you have Salesforce consultant or developer experience, or have proven project management experience in an IT environment, please visit our website www.wigroup.com/careers for more details.
As an established implementation partner of salesforce.com, offering consultancy, development, implementation, data migration and training services to deliver your business objectives, be they cost management, revenue enhancement or improved customer satisfaction and retention. We attribute our success to the right people, partners and approach to make us stand out.
READ MORE...
